channel.title: How do you add game objects?
channel.description: I'm using Delta, 317. Oh and I tried searching but nothing came up, by Game objects I mean things like fences and trees.

item.title: How do you add game objects?
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Okay open your client.java and search (ctrl-f) for public void NewObjects() {
Underneath that there should be a list of GlobalObjects that were added by the creator. Add whatever codes and coords there.

Just to give you a reference, this is what a little bit of myne looks like:

public void NewObjects() { AddGlobalObject(2957, 3692, 2488, -3, 10);//rune Altar makeGlobalObject(2957, 3692, 2488, -3, 10);//Rune Altar AddGlobalObject(3245, 3611, 823, 0, 10);//Dummy1 makeGlobalObject(3245, 3611, 823, 0, 10);//Dummy1 AddGlobalObject(3244, 3609, 300, -1, 10);//haystack makeGlobalObject(3244, 3609, 300, -1, 10);//haystack AddGlobalObject(3239, 3604, 299, 0, 10);//Hay1 makeGlobalObject(3239, 3604, 299, 0, 10);//Hay1 AddGlobalObject(3236, 3613, 2513, -3, 10);//target1 makeGlobalObject(3236, 3613, 2513, -3, 10);//target1 AddGlobalObject(3239, 3615, 2156, -3, 10);//magicportal makeGlobalObject(3239, 3615, 2156, -3, 10);//magicportal

Read full topic
